categories.title: Property Categories

apartments.title: Apartments
apartments.description: Stylish apartments of various sizes and layouts, ideal for couples, families and individuals. Each apartment offers modern design, plenty of natural light and often a terrace or balcony with sea views.

penthouses.title: Penthouses
penthouses.description: Luxury penthouses in the highest floors, often with panoramic views of the coast and private rooftop terrace. Some units include private pool or hot tub.

familyHouses.title: Family, Terraced Houses & Semi-Detached
familyHouses.description: Spacious houses suitable for family living, surrounded by peace and greenery. They offer private garden, often with pool, and plenty of space for everyday life and relaxation.

villas.title: Villas
villas.description: Standalone villas with premium amenities and emphasis on maximum privacy. Ideal choice for demanding clients looking for luxury retreat with breathtaking views and premium location.

residentialComplexes.title: Properties in Residential Complex
residentialComplexes.description: Living in secure and prestigious complexes that offer shared spaces such as pools, wellness, gyms, gardens or coworking centers. Ideal for those looking for community lifestyle.

hotelServices.title: Properties with Hotel Services
hotelServices.description: Residences with access to hotel services such as cleaning, concierge, catering or property management. Perfect choice for comfortable and carefree stay.

golfProperties.title: Golf Properties
golfProperties.description: Properties located near top golf courses. Ideal for golf enthusiasts who want to combine their passion with living in a prestigious location.

smartHomes.title: Smart & Green Living
smartHomes.description: Modern projects with emphasis on sustainability, low energy consumption and ecological materials. Perfect for those looking for harmony with nature.

hero.title: English Embankment Palace
hero.subtitle: Exceptional in all parameters - Luxury palace-style living in the heart of Plzeň's historic center

aboutProject.title: About the Project
aboutProject.description1: The English Embankment Palace is growing in the very heart of Plzeň's historic city center, where new construction is an exceptionally rare phenomenon. Just a few steps from Republic Square with the Cathedral of St. Bartholomew and surrounded by Plzeň's most beautiful parks and the popular Radbuza River embankment.
aboutProject.description2: Simply put, this is a unique opportunity to purchase a luxury city apartment in a perfect location at a prestigious address. The palace-style building from the drawing board of renowned architects from PRO-STORY studio will bring its residents not only exclusive views but also a residential inner courtyard with park landscaping.

constructionStatus.title: Construction in Progress
constructionStatus.description: Project realization began in June 2024 and construction is already in full swing. Completion is scheduled for early 2028.

projectFeaturesSection.title: Project Features
projectFeaturesSection.subtitle: Discover what makes English Embankment Palace exceptional in all parameters

commercialSpace.title: Commercial Space
commercialSpace.description1: The first two above-ground floors will offer nearly three thousand square meters of commercial space for rent. The first floor will be elevated with approximately 1,200 m² of retail space, suitable for brand stores, showrooms, or services.
commercialSpace.description2: The second floor will have around 1,600 m² of offices and several apartments available.

exclusiveApartments.title: Exclusive Apartments
exclusiveApartments.description1: From the third to the eighth floor, exclusively residential units will be located. The entire project will offer approximately 200 apartments of all layouts and sizes for sale.
exclusiveApartments.description2: From the smallest 1+kk with about 30 m² to beautiful spacious penthouses and maisonettes with custom-designed layouts and terraces overlooking the city center or the Radbuza River.

parking.title: Hassle-free Parking
parking.description1: Parking will be available in a total of four floors, providing sufficient parking spaces for the administrative high-rise building, as well as for shops, offices, and apartments.
parking.description2: We're planning nearly 400 parking spaces. A novelty will be specially adapted parking spaces for electric vehicles with the possibility of faster charging.

parkCourtyard.title: Park Courtyard
parkCourtyard.description1: Thanks to uniquely designed green inner courtyards, you'll gain peace and privacy whenever you desire it. And this at an exclusive address in the very center of the living West Bohemian metropolis.
parkCourtyard.description2: The surrounding street space of the new palace will also be improved and beautified. The prestige of the location will be emphasized by the building's architecture with a series of terraces planted with trees and ornamental shrubs.

externalViews.title: External Building Views
externalViews.subtitle: Explore the architectural beauty and design of the English Embankment Palace

interiorVisualizations.title: Interior Visualizations
interiorVisualizations.subtitle: Discover the interior layouts and designs for all apartment types

premiumStandards.title: Highest Standard in Plzeň
premiumStandards.subtitle: Luxury and comfort as standard - exceptional execution in every detail

parkCourtyard.description: Private green inner courtyard with park design

premiumStandards.description: Triple-glazed windows, wooden floors, underfloor heating

location.title: Exclusive Location
location.description: Exceptional location in the very heart of the historic city center, just a few steps from Republic Square. Surrounded by the river and Plzeň's most beautiful parks. Culture, gastronomy, business, nightlife – everything that makes the city alive and inspiring is now just a few steps from your apartment.

hero.title: Bydlení Hořovice
hero.subtitle: From the foundation up - a good place for life. We asked ourselves what an ideal place to live should look like, and then we created it.

aboutProject.title: About the Project
aboutProject.description1: Bydlení Hořovice represents our vision of creating an ideal place to live. Located between Plzeň and Prague, in a city that's growing and developing, this new neighborhood offers the perfect balance for those who don't want to live in a big city or village, but want everything within reach.
aboutProject.description2: We've built this project from the foundation up with honest, thorough work. Our buildings are constructed as solid brick structures using quality red bricks that provide excellent sound insulation for privacy and peace. We've selected timeless materials that last, and we ensure custom kitchen and built-in wardrobe production tailored to your chosen apartment.

communityFocus.title: Community Focus
communityFocus.description: We live and breathe this project with pride. We're constantly building and improving our neighborhood, staying connected with residents through WhatsApp groups and always turning feedback into action.

projectBenefits.title: What Makes Us Special
projectBenefits.subtitle: Discover the unique benefits that set Bydlení Hořovice apart

perfectLocation.title: Perfect Location
perfectLocation.description1: Located between Plzeň and Prague, in a city that's growing and developing. This new neighborhood offers everything you need: shops, kindergartens, work opportunities, healthcare, culture, and nature - all within reach.
perfectLocation.description2: Perfect for those who don't want to live in a big city or village, but want to have everything at hand.

qualityConstruction.title: Quality Construction
qualityConstruction.description1: We want you to get an honest piece of our work for your money - an apartment that becomes your comfortable and valuable home. That's why we build our buildings as solid brick structures.
qualityConstruction.description2: Using quality red bricks that provide excellent sound insulation for privacy and peace, with timeless design materials that last.

activeCommunity.title: Active Community
activeCommunity.description1: We live and breathe this project with pride. We're constantly building and improving our neighborhood, staying connected with residents through WhatsApp groups and always turning feedback into action.
activeCommunity.description2: It's not just about how you feel behind your apartment door - home is made by pleasant neighbors, cleanliness throughout the neighborhood, a sense of security, and details like parking and playgrounds.

diverseApartmentOptions.title: Diverse Apartment Options
diverseApartmentOptions.description1: Our neighborhood offers a diverse range of apartment layouts to create a varied and pleasant community. You'll find apartments for families with children, young couples starting out, and those seeking comfort and modern living with perfect access to services.
diverseApartmentOptions.description2: From 1+kk to 4+kk layouts, there's something for everyone's needs and lifestyle.

apartmentStandards.title: Apartment Standards & Benefits
apartmentStandards.subtitle: Carefully thought-out and honest standards you won't find elsewhere

soundInsulatingWalls.description: 300mm red brick construction for complete privacy

sampleApartment.description2: We'd be happy to welcome you to our sample apartment, right in Hořovice. Experience the quality and craftsmanship that goes into every detail of your future home.

location.title: Perfect Location Between Two Cities
location.description1: Located between Plzeň and Prague, in a city that's growing and developing. This new neighborhood offers everything you need: shops, kindergartens, work opportunities, healthcare, culture, and nature - all within reach.
location.description2: Perfect for those who don't want to live in a big city or village, but want to have everything at hand. Enjoy the proximity of nature while benefiting from excellent connections to both cities.

hero.title: ICON Park Kladno
hero.subtitle: Modern and comfortable living in the new residential district of Kladno

projectOverview.title: Your New Home Starts at ICON Park
projectOverview.description1: Looking for modern and comfortable living that meets your expectations? ICON Park in Kladno brings the ideal combination of modern design, comfort, and a quiet location in the newly revitalized district.
projectOverview.description2: Apartments with layouts from 1+kk to 4+kk are designed with emphasis on quality and comfort, each with its own space for relaxation - balcony, terrace, or front garden. Project completion in 2025 means your new home is closer than you think. ICON Park is where your future begins.

readyForMoveIn.title: Ready for Move-in!
readyForMoveIn.description: The building has received final approval and you can start moving in this summer!

award.title: Prestigious Award Winner
award.subtitle: ICON PARK received the prestigious Jury Award in the Real Estate Project of the Year 2024 competition
award.awardTitle: Real Estate Project of the Year 2024
award.quote: We greatly value this award, especially given the strong competition in this year's edition. It confirms that the combination of modern architecture, quality execution, and attractive location resonates not only with customers but also with the professional public.
award.attribution: František Vladař, Investment & Project Director, BHM group

projectStatus.completionDetails: Buildings and apartments are completely finished, including outdoor fitness zone and children's playground

location.title: Quick Access to Work and Entertainment
location.description1: Kladno offers the ideal combination of quiet living and excellent accessibility to Prague. In the ICON Park residential district, you have everything within reach - quality schools, kindergartens, shops, services, restaurants, sports facilities, and cycling paths.
location.description2: Additionally, you can enjoy the proximity of nature while benefiting from excellent connections to both Kladno and the capital city.

projectOverview.title: About the Project
projectOverview.description: Triangl Park represents a unique residential concept in the southern district of Plzeň-Bory. This exceptional project stands out not only for its attractive location with easy access to Plzeň city center, but also for its comprehensive approach, quality standards, and above all, the unique opportunity to choose from three diverse living standards.

Excellent accessibility to Plzeň city center by public transport in just a few minutes, great local civic amenities, rich sports activities, and forest areas within walking distance make Triangl Park an exceptionally attractive location and, above all, a very pleasant place to live.

hero.title: Tiskárna Kristiánov
hero.subtitle: Living with a story in the heart of Liberec. Where history meets modern luxury in a uniquely reimagined industrial complex.

projectOverview.title: About the Project
projectOverview.description1: Tiskárna Kristiánov offers unconventional living and non-residential spaces in a comprehensively reconstructed complex with fascinating history. This architectural pearl combines the strong periods of garden city and industrial era history.
projectOverview.description2: The complex is located in the city center with excellent accessibility. We've preserved the original face of the buildings while giving them new expression. The dominant feature is a 32-meter high non-functional chimney visible from distant corners of Liberec.

secondStage.title: Second Stage Now Available
secondStage.description: Don't hesitate and choose your dream home today. Special introductory prices available for a limited time.

projectHistory.title: A Story That Began in 1791
projectHistory.subtitle: Discover the fascinating journey from Berger's house to today's modern complex

1791.event: Berger's house built - first Liberec manufactory

1800s.description: Development of the garden city quarter

1900s.description: Largest German printing plant in Bohemia

2024.description: Modern redevelopment with respect for history

whatMakesUsSpecial.title: What Makes Us Special
whatMakesUsSpecial.subtitle: Discover the unique features that set Tiskárna Kristiánov apart

excellentLocation.title: Excellent Location
excellentLocation.description1: Live in the very heart of the metropolis under Ještěd. The complex is located in the city center with excellent accessibility, forming the central triangle of Liberec together with Staré and Nové Město.
excellentLocation.description2: Perfect access to shopping, public transport, education, and cultural facilities.

stylishLiving.title: Stylish Living
stylishLiving.description1: We've combined history and unique modern architecture. The complex features neorenaissance, industrial, and modern architectural elements, creating a truly unique living environment.
stylishLiving.description2: Each building tells its own story while offering modern comfort and luxury.

modernTechnology.title: Modern Technology
modernTechnology.description1: We take care of your comfortable and energy-efficient living. All apartments feature air recuperation and underfloor heating, with photovoltaic panels and cogeneration units for sustainable energy.
modernTechnology.description2: Rainwater collection systems and smart building management ensure reduced monthly costs.

comprehensiveAmenities.title: Comprehensive Amenities
comprehensiveAmenities.description1: The complex includes 200 apartments and non-residential spaces with room for galleries, cafés, bakeries, fitness centers, and other civic amenities.
comprehensiveAmenities.description2: Inner courtyard features children's corner, fountain, clock tower, and communal outdoor spaces.

apartmentStandards.title: Premium Construction Standards
apartmentStandards.subtitle: Reducing energy consumption is our priority. Discover the sustainable features that make your home efficient and comfortable.

airRecuperation.name: Air Recuperation

exteriorViews.subtitle: Explore the unique industrial heritage and modern architectural fusion

location.title: Perfect Location in Liberec Center
location.description: Together with Staré and Nové Město, Kristiánov forms the central triangle of Liberec. Located in the east of Liberec, this urban district is home to over 5,000 residents and was created with the aim of building a representative environment around the adjacent castle complex and famous Liebieg Palace.

foreignersBuy.title: Can foreigners buy real estate in the Czech Republic?
foreignersBuy.content:
Yes, but with some restrictions:
- EU citizens can buy property freely.
- Non-EU citizens can buy residential property if they have a long-term residence permit or establish a Czech company to hold the property.
- Agricultural and forest land has stricter regulations for non-EU buyers.

popularCities.title: What are the most popular cities for real estate investment?
popularCities.content:
- Prague (highest demand, strong rental market)
- Brno (growing tech hub, student rentals)
- Ostrava (lower prices, industrial redevelopment)
- Karlovy Vary & Český Krumlov (tourist hotspots, short-term rentals)

marketPerformance.title: How is the Czech real estate market performing?
marketPerformance.content:
- Prague remains stable with steady price growth.
- Regional cities offer better affordability and rental yields.
- Interest rates have risen, slightly cooling demand.

buyingSteps.title: What are the steps to buying property in the Czech Republic?
buyingSteps.content:
1. Find a property (via real estate agents or online portals like Sreality.cz, Bezrealitky.cz).
2. Sign a reservation agreement (usually requires a deposit).
3. Conduct due diligence (check land registry, debts, zoning).
4. Sign a purchase contract (notarization required).
5. Register ownership in the Cadastral Register (Katastr nemovitostí).

feesAndTaxes.title: What fees and taxes apply when buying property?
feesAndTaxes.content:
- Property transfer tax (4%) – Paid by the buyer (some exemptions apply).
- Real estate agent fee (typically 2–6%, paid by seller or buyer depending on agreement).
- Notary & legal fees (approx. 0.5–1% of property value).
- Land registry fee (around CZK 1,000–5,000).

needLawyer.title: Do I need a lawyer when buying property?
needLawyer.content:
Highly recommended to:
- Check legal title & encumbrances.
- Review contracts.
- Ensure proper registration.

foreignersMortgage.title: Can foreigners get a mortgage in the Czech Republic?
foreignersMortgage.content:
Yes, but conditions vary:
- EU citizens can get mortgages more easily.
- Non-EU citizens may need a higher down payment (30–50%) and proof of income.
- Interest rates currently range from 4–6%.

downPayment.title: What is the typical down payment for a mortgage?

sellingTaxes.title: What taxes apply when selling property?
sellingTaxes.content:
- Capital gains tax (15%) – Applies if sold within 5 years of purchase (exempt if it was your primary residence).
- No inheritance or gift tax (but income tax may apply).

sellingTime.title: How long does it take to sell a property?
sellingTime.content:
- Prague: 2–6 months (depending on price & location).
- Smaller towns: May take longer.

rentingInvestment.title: Is renting property a good investment in the Czech Republic?
rentingInvestment.content:
- Prague offers 4–6% rental yields.
- Student cities (Brno, Olomouc) have high demand.
- Short-term rentals (Airbnb) are profitable in tourist areas but face increasing regulation.

tenantRights.title: What are tenant rights in the Czech Republic?
tenantRights.content:
- Standard lease duration: 1+ year.
- Landlord can increase rent once per year (with notice).
- Eviction requires a court order (except for serious violations).

cadastralRegister.title: What is the Cadastral Register (Katastr nemovitostí)?
cadastralRegister.content: The official land registry where property ownership, mortgages, and restrictions are recorded. Always verify details before buying.

residencePermit.title: Do I need a residence permit to buy property?
residencePermit.content: No, but non-EU buyers may need a company or residency to purchase residential property.

shortTermRentals.title: Are there restrictions on short-term rentals (Airbnb)?
shortTermRentals.content:
- Prague requires registration and limits short-term rentals in some areas.
- Other cities may introduce similar rules.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: Wide range of services tailored to each real estate case
services.description: When working with my clients, I prefer a personal approach and completely individual services, whether we're dealing with selling or buying property. My rich service offering includes everything that the best real estate agencies in the Czech Republic and abroad offer today. I always set the business strategy at the beginning of cooperation, after a thorough discussion with clients.

selling.title: Property Sale
selling.description: Most sellers need to sell their property as quickly as possible and for the highest price. However, this doesn't always have to be the case. Some prioritize speed, others cash payment. Some are not in a hurry, and on the contrary, they care about finding a new solid owner of the property who will continue, for example, in maintaining a long-standing garden.

process.title: How will the entire process work?
